nodes.text: BT-413 was a member of Stormtrooper Corps who conducted operations as part of Imperial Security for the Galactic Empire's Quarantine Zone on the planet Dathomir during the time of the Galactic Civil War. BT-413 was assigned for Level 1 of Security Post 12.

BT-413 was first mentioned in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
